voxatrace/com.musicmuni.voxatrace.calibra.feedback/SongFeedbackGenerator

SongFeedbackGenerator

class SongFeedbackGenerator(dtwScorer: DtwScorer)

Feedback generation for song (melody) evaluation using DTW.

Ported from native/src/calibra/core/feedback/SongFeedbackGenerator.cpp for the "Kotlin-max, C-min" migration.

Evaluates student singing against reference melodies using DTW (Dynamic Time Warping) for pitch alignment and comparison.
